description: An alternative to the built-in Express middleware for serving static files. Electricity follows a number of best practices for making web pages fast.
name: electricity

scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --exit -R spec -t 21000 && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
